title: complaining about the ranked afk system
body:
why rito
im complaining because i just lost a game while someone decided to afk a tiny bit after the remake window 
i mean other games like rocket league have a better system where you can just leave the game without any penalties and in normals if someone leaves they get replaced by a bot and that game has only been up for around 3 years ish 
but that probably wouldnt work in league because itd just be a waste of time 
i can still remember reading a ask rito or something like that about people deciding to afk and you said you didnt want to do anything because people might get others to afk so they dont lose anything
